(Click on the image above to see @dtube video)

Hi Friends, I'm continuing my series on how to pick up girls internationally. So far, I have taught lessons on how to pick up girls in Thailand, Japan, and Sweden. Today, my good friend @ramengirl will be teaching you how to pick up ladies in Korea!

In this tutorial you will learn the following Korean phrases:

  • "Hello, how are you?"
  • "How old are you?" (In Korean culture, it is totally appropriate to ask age. People expect you to ask, so they know how to address your title)
  • "Would you like to come over to my house for Ramen?" wink wink
  • "Do you smell something burning?" "It's my heart burning for you!"

Enjoy! I hope this helps you find you pick up your international lady!
